Name: Patrick Gavin Duffy's Punch
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of mint sprigs bouquet.
Review: A full three ounces of alcohol per serve means this sure packs a tasty punch.
History: Adapted from the following recipe in Patrick Gavin Duffy's 1934 The Official Mixer's Manual : " Patrick Gavin Duffy's Punch Juice of 1 rich Orange 1 Drink Brandy ½ Teaspoon Powdered sugar ½ Glass Benedictine Shake in ice and pour all into tall glass, decorate with Mint and Fruit in season. Drink through straw. "
Nutrition: One serving of Patrick Gavin Duffy's Punch contains 272 calories
